books.author: by Louise Penny
books.description: Chief Inspector Armand Gamache, retired from the Sûreté du Québec and settled in the village of Three Pines, searches for a neighbor’s missing husband.
books.name: THE LONG WAY HOME

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: After a terrible accident puts an end to his professional football career, a young man returns home to Thunder Point to face his mistakes.
books.name: THE HOMECOMING

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael White
books.description: The world’s most exclusive detective agency has opened an office in Australia, and within days Craig Gisto and his new team have their hands full with a series of grisly crimes.
books.name: PRIVATE DOWN UNDER

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by Jayne Castle
books.description: Sedona’s new job managing a hotel and tavern on Rainshadow Island is helping her move on from her tragic past, but a bizarre disaster has brought a pack of rowdy ghost hunters to her inn.
books.name: THE HOT ZONE

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: Claire Randall, an English nurse, is transported back to 1743 during a second honeymoon in the Scottish Highlands. There she begins an affair with James Fraser, a redheaded soldier. Originally published in 1991.
books.name: OUTLANDER

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A North Carolina pediatrician is held captive by a mysterious man who forces her to question her life.
books.name: MEAN STREAK

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Brent Weeks
books.description: A fantasy sequel to “The Black Prism” and “The Blinding Knife.”
books.name: THE BROKEN EYE

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by Lisa Jackson
books.description: Sarah McAdams returns to her childhood home with her daughters. But there are rumors that their house is haunted, and it holds other dark memories for Sarah.
books.name: CLOSE TO HOME

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: Volume 2 of the Outlander series, about an 18th-century Scottish warrior and a time-traveling World War II-era nurse; first published in 1992.
books.name: DRAGONFLY IN AMBER

books.author: by Lori Foster
books.description: An inheritance reunites a mixed martial arts fighter with the woman he’s never forgotten.
books.name: NO LIMITS
